panels.content:
## About values
* Value: current normalized value Usually it is at 100 when everything is ok. Higher values often mean that the attribute has never been updated (implies 100).
* Threshold: "threshold" is the absolute health threshold and indicates the value at/below which SMART consideres the attribute a failure. Most attributes that have a zero threshold are not critical. When they decrease, it just means that you drive gets older. Other attributes have thresholds greater than 0 and are often critical.
* Worst: the all overtime reported worst.
* thresholds are calculated by current value/worst - threshold i.e value 100, threshold 50 = 50
